message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering the value it brings to your business.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value and the price you mentioned earlier.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire to save some money, but I'm still looking to get a good price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11500. This is a fair compromise, considering the value the product brings to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. I think this is a reasonable price considering the market value and the price you mentioned earlier.

I understand your desire to save even more, Bob, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $11200. This is as low as I can go, considering the value the product brings to your business.
